SEARCH
Package service

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
service.BookService
public class BookService extends Object
Service class to handle book-related operations. Acts as a layer between the DAO and higher-level application logic. Provides methods to add books, check availability, and search books.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Khadeja and Masa

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructor to inject both BookDAO and LoansDAO instances.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      public String addBook(Book book)
      Adds a new book after validating the fields.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book object to add
      Returns:
      a success message if added, or an error message if validation fails

    • bookAvalbltyChack

      public Loan bookAvalbltyChack(String book_id)
      Checks if a book is available by its ID.
      Parameters:
      book_id - the ID of the book as a String
      Returns:
      a Loan object if the book is currently loaned, otherwise null

    • findbyAuthor

      public List<Book> findbyAuthor(String author)
      Finds books by author name.
      Parameters:
      author - the author name to search for
      Returns:
      a list of Book objects or null if input is invalid

    • findbyid

      public List<Book> findbyid(String id)
      Finds books by ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the book ID as a String
      Returns:
      a list of Book objects matching the ID or null if invalid

    • findbyTitle

      public List<Book> findbyTitle(String Title)
      Finds books by title.
      Parameters:
      Title - the title to search for
      Returns:
      a list of Book objects matching the title or null if invalid

    • findeAllBooks

      public List<Book> findeAllBooks()
      Retrieves all books from the database.
      Returns:
      a list of all Book objects
